results.title: [Effects of statins on postoperative treatment of patients after aortocoronary bypass grafting].
results.text_hl: The aim of this study was to demonstrate effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatine@@@ on postoperative treatment, laboratory findings and @<m>DISEASE_Pericardial_Effusion</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010490 @@@pericardial effusion@@@ during postoperative period, in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after aortocoronary bypass grafting procedures.

citations.NLM: Kulić M, Dilić M, Gerc V, Heljić B. [Effects of statins on postoperative treatment of patients after aortocoronary bypass grafting]. Med Arh. 2009;63(3):152-6. PMID: 20088162
